properties.displayName: [Preview]: Configure log filter expressions and datastore to be used for full logs for specified Azure Machine Learning computes
properties.description: Provide log filter expression and datastore to be used for full logs in specified Azure Machine Learning computes and can be assigned at the workspace. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/amlpolicydoc.

metadata.displayName: [Preview]: Compute names where Azure ML jobs run
metadata.description: List of compute names where this policy should be applied. Ex. cpu-cluster;gpu-cluster. If no value is provided to this parameter then policy is applicable to all computes.

metadata.displayName: [Preview]: Compute type for the compute where Azure ML jobs run
metadata.description: Compute type name. If Any is selected, the policy is applicable to any compute types.

metadata.displayName: [Preview]: Is the compute in isolated network
metadata.description: Only applicable for MachineLearningCompute type. "Yes: apply the policy to computes in isolated network". "No: apply the policy to computes that are out of isolated network". "Any: apply the policy regardless of if the compute is in isolated network or not".
List of log filter expressions used to filter logs. Ex. ^prefix1.*$
Datastore used to store filtered logs. Ex. LogsDatastore which is configured in AML.
Enable or disable the execution of the policy.
